text:
A solid front page story from @DailyMailUK @MailOnline today pointing out how, if people want to drink in pubs, they have to somehow get hold of a small piece of card with a squiggle on it...
#Vaccine #VaccinePassport #Pubs #UK #Covid19 #AltDimHeadlines #AltDimHead #VaccineCards https://t.co/S9jnlMFebv
